about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to be silly? Be goofy? Find happiness after losing your entire family? Well look no further!

A Silly Goofy Dream 2 is a game set in your dreams, in which you can go around finding funny characters and seeing what interesting things they have to do or say! Each character is completely unique (in some ways), and all are made to make you laugh!

There are many different levels to explore and places to go, though for some reason it seems the further you go the more you're grip on reality slowly goes away...

You can run around, jump around, interact with NPC's, punch NPCs, and grind through tons of enemies with goofy weapons to make it to the end!

What will keep you going? What will make you last? Will these dreams truly stop the never-ending torment?

content_descriptors.notes: The game is mostly innocent, but no one is truly innocent anymore, and neither are you.

name: A Silly Goofy Dream 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750+
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa
Atos criminosos
Temas sensíveis

short_description: This game is funny, it is not meant to be taken seriously. ASGD2 is a funny linear story game in which you go around finding funny NPC's, interacting with them, and completing levels to try an unlock a complete story.
